IMUSim
Package imusim :: Package algorithms :: Module orientation :: Class DistLinAccelCF

Class DistLinAccelCF

source code

Implementation of the multi-IMU orientation algorithm by Young & Ling.

See A. D. Young, M. J. Ling and D. K. Arvind. "Distributed Estimation of Linear Acceleration for Improved Accuracy in Wireless Inertial Motion Capture", in Proc. 9th ACM/IEEE International Conference on Information Processing in Sensor Networks, ACM, 2010, pp. 256-267.

Method Details

__init__(self, initialTime, initialRotation, k, joint, offset, **kwargs)
(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise orientation filter.

Parameters:
  • initialTime - Initial time.
  • initialRotation - Initial rotation (Quaternion).
  • k - Filter blending co-efficient (float). At each timestep, a correction will be applied of 1/k times the difference between the gyro integration and vector observation results.
  • joint - The Joint the IMU is attached to.
  • offset - The offset of the IMU in the joint's co-ordinate frame (3x1 np.ndarray)
Decorators:
  • @prepend_method_doc(BachmannCF)
Overrides: object.__init__
